H0.text: In what French region would you find Omaha, Juno, and Gold beaches. Brittany

H1.text: In what French region would you find Omaha, Juno, and Gold beaches. Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur

H2.text: In what French region would you find Omaha, Juno, and Gold beaches. Pays de la Loire

H3.text: In what French region would you find Omaha, Juno, and Gold beaches. Normandy

A4.text: The Allies coordinated a massive build‑up of troops and supplies to support a large‑scale invasion of Normandy in the D‑Day landings on 6 June 1944 under the code name Operation Overlord.
